title: Nippon Animation 50-shuunen Kinen Movie

alternative_titles.ja: 日本アニメーション50周年記念ムービー

synopsis:
A collaboration video with anime artist misato., who attracts people with her soft and warm touch, has completed a movie commemorating the 50th anniversary of the founding of Japan anime.
The theme is film in a film strip(room)!
Our popular characters are depicted vividly in the video.

(Source: Nippon Animation Official Site)
